LanguageData.MakeTincture.label: 制作蘑菇酊剂
LanguageData.MakeTincture.description: Instill mushrooms into tincture. Useful for medicine. Requires basic understanding of cooking. \n\n产出：1。
LanguageData.MakeTincture_Bulk.label: 制作蘑菇酊剂 x4
LanguageData.MakeTincture_Bulk.description: Instill a few bottles of tincture from mushrooms. Useful for medicine. Requires basic understanding of cooking. \n\n产出：4。
LanguageData.MakeTinctureHealroot.label: 制作草药酊剂
LanguageData.MakeTinctureHealroot.description: Instill healroot into a tincture. Useful for medicine. Requires basic understanding of cooking. \n\n产出：1。
LanguageData.BrewMedicalDrink.label: 制作健康饮料
LanguageData.BrewMedicalDrink.description: Brew a bottle of healthy medical drink from healroot and hops. Requires basic understanding of cooking. \n\n产出：1。
